{{cpp/io/basic_istream/title|swap}}
{{cpp/io/basic_istream/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|1=
protected:
void swap( basic_istream&amp; rhs );
}}

Calls {{c|basic_ios::swap(rhs)}} to swap all data members of the base class except for {{ltf|cpp/io/basic_ios/rdbuf}}, and swaps the values of the {{rlpf|gcount}} counters between {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}}. This swap function is protected: it is called by the swap functions of the swappable input stream classes {{lc|std::basic_ifstream}} and {{lc|std::basic_istringstream}}, which know how to correctly swap the associated streambuffers.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|different {{tt|basic_istream}} object of the same type to swap with}}
{{par end}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;
#include &lt;utility&gt;

int main()
{
    std::istringstream s1("hello");
    std::istringstream s2("bye");

    s1.swap(s2); // OK, istringstream has a public swap()
    std::swap(s1, s2); // OK, calls s1.swap(s2)
//  std::cin.swap(s2); // ERROR: swap is a protected member

    std::cout &lt;&lt; s1.rdbuf() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
hello
}}
